head.description: no-missing-end-of-source-newline Disallow missing end-of-source newlines. Completely empty files are not considered warnings. Options true…
head.title: no-missing-end-of-source-newline

body:
#no-missing-end-of-source-newline

Disallow missing end-of-source newlines.

    a { color: pink; }
    \n
/** ↑
 * This newline */

Completely empty files are not considered warnings.

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { color: pink; }
\n
